languages.text: "Да простит меня Великий, но сегодня я радуюсь, что этот ашмаг на нашей стороне! Давайте пустим его первым и подождем немного?"

traits.locale_text: "Да простит меня Великий, но сегодня я радуюсь, что этот ашмаг на нашей стороне! Давайте пустим его первым и подождем немного?"

languages.text: "May the Exalted One forgive me, but, for once, I am glad that ashmag is on our side! Why don't we let him go first and wait a little while?"
languages.original_text: "Да простит меня Великий, но сегодня я радуюсь, что этот ашмаг на нашей стороне! Давайте пустим его первым и подождем немного?"

traits.locale_text: "May the Exalted One forgive me, but, for once, I am glad that ashmag is on our side! Why don't we let him go first and wait a little while?"
"May the Exalted One forgive me, but, for once, I am glad that ashmag is on our side! Why don't we let him go first and wait a little while?"
"May the Exalted One forgive me, but, for once, I am glad that ashmag is on our side! Why don't we let him go first and wait a little while?"
"May the Exalted One forgive me, but, for once, I am glad that ashmag is on our side! Why don't we let him go first and wait a little while?"
"May the Exalted One forgive me, but, for once, I am glad that ashmag is on our side! Why don't we let him go first and wait a little while?"
"May the Exalted One forgive me, but, for once, I am glad that ashmag is on our side! Why don't we let him go first and wait a little while?"

languages.text: 「エグザルテッド・ワン、どうかこのアタシを許してね。でも、今回ばかりはあのアッシュマグが味方で本当にありがたいよ！彼を先に行かせて、アタシたちはしばらく様子を見るのはどう？」
languages.original_text: "May the Exalted One forgive me, but, for once, I am glad that ashmag is on our side! Why don't we let him go first and wait a little while?"

traits.locale_text: 「エグザルテッド・ワン、どうかこのアタシを許してね。でも、今回ばかりはあのアッシュマグが味方で本当にありがたいよ！彼を先に行かせて、アタシたちはしばらく様子を見るのはどう？」

languages.text: "Möge der Erhabene mir vergeben, doch ich bin ausnahmsweise froh, diesen Ashmag an unserer Seite zu haben! Lassen wir ihn doch vorgehen und warten ein Weilchen, bevor wir nachkommen."
languages.original_text: "May the Exalted One forgive me, but, for once, I am glad that ashmag is on our side! Why don't we let him go first and wait a little while?"

traits.locale_text: "Möge der Erhabene mir vergeben, doch ich bin ausnahmsweise froh, diesen Ashmag an unserer Seite zu haben! Lassen wir ihn doch vorgehen und warten ein Weilchen, bevor wir nachkommen."

languages.text: « Que l'Exalté me pardonne, mais pour une fois, je suis contente que cet ashmag soit avec nous ! Je propose qu'on le laisse prendre les devants en lui donnant une bonne longueur d'avance. »
languages.original_text: "May the Exalted One forgive me, but, for once, I am glad that ashmag is on our side! Why don't we let him go first and wait a little while?"

traits.locale_text: « Que l'Exalté me pardonne, mais pour une fois, je suis contente que cet ashmag soit avec nous ! Je propose qu'on le laisse prendre les devants en lui donnant une bonne longueur d'avance. »

languages.text: «¡Que el Exaltado me perdone, pero por una vez me alegro de que ese ashmag esté de nuestra parte! ¿Por qué no dejamos que vaya él primero y esperamos a ver qué pasa?».
languages.original_text: "May the Exalted One forgive me, but, for once, I am glad that ashmag is on our side! Why don't we let him go first and wait a little while?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Que el Exaltado me perdone, pero por una vez me alegro de que ese ashmag esté de nuestra parte! ¿Por qué no dejamos que vaya él primero y esperamos a ver qué pasa?».

languages.text: “愿至高无上的神皇原谅我，但这次，我真的很高兴这个坏种是我们这边的！不如让他先上，我们先在旁边等一会儿吧？”
languages.original_text: "May the Exalted One forgive me, but, for once, I am glad that ashmag is on our side! Why don't we let him go first and wait a little while?"

traits.locale_text: “愿至高无上的神皇原谅我，但这次，我真的很高兴这个坏种是我们这边的！不如让他先上，我们先在旁边等一会儿吧？”

languages.text: "Görkemli affetsin ama ilk defa saflarımızda bir külboğaz olmasına memnunum! Onu önden göndersek de biz biraz beklesek ya?"
languages.original_text: "May the Exalted One forgive me, but, for once, I am glad that ashmag is on our side! Why don't we let him go first and wait a little while?"

traits.locale_text: "Görkemli affetsin ama ilk defa saflarımızda bir külboğaz olmasına memnunum! Onu önden göndersek de biz biraz beklesek ya?"

languages.original_text: "May the Exalted One forgive me, but, for once, I am glad that ashmag is on our side! Why don't we let him go first and wait a little while?"
